data.meta_site_name: Robert Gavora Fine and Rare Books
data.text:
Sauk City, WI: Arkham House: Publishers, 1996. Elizabeth Lawhead Bourne. First edition, first printing. Hardcover. Item #45975

ISBN: 0870541706

Signed by Rosenblum below her photo frontis, and by the illustrator Bourne on the title page. 3515 copies printed. Collects nine of Rosenblum's stories. Fine in fine and bright dust jacket.
